content:
I have a concept map between an "off the grid" value set (something internal from CDC) and a value set built with codes from SNOMED and NullFlavor.
Tried to build a concept map, and the display value from the source code doesn't get rendered.

It's there in the json, but not in the rendered. html.
So you want the display value of the source code to render, not just the display value of the target code?

Precisely!
I think the publisher does render the source display value if the source codesystem is 'official'. In this case the source code system's definition is buried in a spreadsheet and not accessible to the publisher.
sushi hangs on this for me: Sushi: info Converted 52 FHIR StructureDefinitions. (00:07.0052)
but it's certainly a bug from my perspective
